item.title: Official ModernBeats approved producer
item.dc:creator: mralpos
item.description: Modernbeats approved me as an official Music Producer.
item.content:encoded:
Modernbeats approved me as an official Music Producer who uses only Top Billboard-Proven Sounds:

You’re now an official Music Producer who
uses only Top Billboard-Proven Sounds:

item.title: Collaboration with ModernBeats #2
item.dc:creator: mralpos
item.description: One of my works has been forwarded for placement on major production labels in the US.
item.content:encoded:
Successful collaboration with ModernBeats.

As part of my collaboration with ModernBeats, one of my works has been accepted and forwarded for placement on major production labels in the US. Here is an excerpt from the e-mail:

Your Final Status For This Closed Campaign:
Aleksandar Postolovski – *Verified Song Submit Musician*
Final status & feedback for the ‘POP/DANCE BEATS needed for THE CW
CW, Bravo, Spike ‘ Campaign running 2014-02-12 to 2014-05-04.

# of Songs Submitted: 1
# of Songs Reviewed: 1
Song Name: Mr.AlposBeat52.mp3
Song Status: Selected – Your song was selected & is now being forwarded as solicited to music executives. You’ll be contacted within 2-3 weeks if there’s interest in signing, placing, or awarding your music. Check your email for your badge award from Song Submit!

Congratulations Aleksandar! One Or More Of Your Songs Above Has Been Selected:
Next, your selected music will be forwarded as solicited and reviewed by music executives
for possible signing and placement on major Film, TV, Record Label, or Album projects.
If music executives are interested in using your music, you will be contacted via email or
phone within 2-3 weeks! Be sure you’re following us on Facebook & Twitter to receive
additional notification. Show your fans your music was selected by posting your badge:

item.title: Collaboration with ModernBeats #1
item.dc:creator: mralpos
item.description: Another beat produced by me has been accepted for placement on major production labels in the US.
item.content:encoded:
Successful collaboration with ModernBeats.

As part of my collaboration with ModernBeats, another beat produced by me has been accepted and forwarded for placement on major production labels in the US. Here is an excerpt from the e-mail:

Your Final Status For The Recently Closed Song Submit Campaign:
Aleksandar Postolovski – Song Submit Musician
Final status and feedback for the ‘R&B POP BEATS needed for Film/TV’ campaign running 2011-06-10 to 2011-07-23

# of Songs Submitted: 1
# of Songs Reviewed: 1
Song Name: DemoBeat-ThemeCm-Fm.mp3
Song Status: Selected – Your song has been selected for this campaign and is now being forwarded as solicited to the client. You will be contacted within 2-3 weeks if there is interest in signing, licensing, or placing your song.

 

Congratulations Aleksandar! One Or More Of Your Songs Above Has Been Selected:
Next, your selected music will be forwarded as solicited and reviewed by music executives
for possible signing and placement on major Film, TV, Record Label, or Album projects.
If music executives are interested in using your music, you will be contacted via email or
phone within 2-3 weeks! Be sure you’re following us on Facebook & Twitter to receive
additional notification. Show your fans your music was selected by posting your badge:
